title: Neural Networks 101
subtitle: Master the fundamentals of AI
description: Dive deep into neural networks, from basic neurons to complex architectures. Learn how AI systems learn and make decisions.
learningObjectives: Understand neuron structure and activation functions
Learn how neural networks process information

title: Quantum Computing Basics
subtitle: Explore the quantum realm
description: Journey into quantum mechanics and computing. Understand qubits, superposition, and quantum algorithms that will revolutionize technology.
learningObjectives: Explore quantum algorithms like Shor's and Grover's

title: React Native Fundamentals
subtitle: Build mobile apps with ease
description: Master React Native for cross-platform mobile development. Learn components, state management, and native features.
learningObjectives: Build mobile UI with React Native components
